content.detailedDescription: I was out in my yard observing the stars tonight when i noticed movement to my right ( the east ) as i looked in that direction i noticed something gray in color flying towards me at a very high rate of speed ( it reminded me of a dove in flight )  as i turned towards it  it flew over me , past me , then as i attempted to turn my head to follow it it flew out of sight towards the west all in a matter of 3 seconds ....No lights, no sound, nothing but a trail of smoke or heat behind  it .
content.summary: Was out in my yard observing the stars when something caught my eye to my right the east as i looked i saw something gray in color flying towards me, over me,  then past me as i turned to follow it i noticed it flying out of sight towards the west

content.detailedDescription:
This evening in the town of bar harbor, maine a friend and i pulled into the hannaford (grocery store.) parking lot and my friend exclaimed "what is that!" i looked at what he was pointing at and saw 2 large highly reflective objects "hanging" in the sky.

we observed them for over 1 min they were completely motionless. we watched a plane fly by and it was clear they were not moving by referencing them to the power lines near us and the plane in the sky that we could see at the time.

i snapped the attached picture and we began to leave go to a higher vantage point to look at this anomaly as my friend was rather excited, as we got in the car the objects vanished at the same time. this cellphone picture is clearly not great but the objects can be clearly seen so i though it should be included here.

i believe they were ufo's because they clearly were not helicopters or planes but were somehow defying gravity in the open sky.
content.summary: Photographed two highly reflective motionless objects, which then disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: So today at about 10 pm when i was returning home from the mall, a few blocks away from my house i looked up in the sky, the first thing i saw were two big, starlike blue orbs chaotically flying around the sky at a fast speed, they left no trail and no soumd whatsoever, they were cloud like and didn't look solid. they kept flying around and passing eachother as if they were playing. it was a cold and cloidy night. the clouds were covering the objects when they were to fly over them, so i'm guessing they were at a very high altitude. they never dissapeared and kept flying around.
content.summary: Today at about 10 pm i saw two big blue objects flying around the sky in a chaotic motion.

content.detailedDescription: So today at about 10 pm when i was returning home from the mall, a few blocks away from my house i looked up in the sky, the first thing i saw were two big, starlike blue orbs chaotically flying around the sky at a fast speed, they left no trail and no soumd whatsoever, they were cloud like and didn't look solid. they kept flying around and passing eachother as if they were playing. it was a cold and cloidy night. the clouds were covering the objects when they were to fly over them, so i'm guessing they were at a very high altitude. they never dissapeared and kept flying around.
content.summary: Today at about 10 pm i saw two big blue objects flying around the sky in a chaotic motion.

content.detailedDescription: as i was walking my dog i looked up and saw a bright star like craft flying across sky at a fast speed and then saw it make a fast turn and it disappeared into a larger craft.While it was close to the other craft a light flashed red and that is when i saw the other craft and i saw the first ufo fly into the other craft and it was gone. the other craft looked like a group of stars until i saw the flash. i raised my hand up spoke in indian and the craft seemed to slow down and communicate then flew into the other craft.
content.summary: Was walking my dog and looked up and saw a star like ufo flying across sky then flew into unknown craft

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my dogs out before going to bed and i always make it a habit of looking into the night sky. i saw two very bright balls of color changing light and i immediately dismissed these as planes. but after watching them for a minute they were noted to be simply hovering. then a minute or so later they both shot straight up and out of view. the rate of acceleration was amazing. i felt totally uneasy. i tried to call my wife from my cell phone and it,showed no signal and was not working properly. i had to take the battery out of my phone and upon turning it back on the battery was dead. it was at least at 50% battery at the time of the event.
content.summary: Two lights came into view, hovered then burst away

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside having a cigarette at about 2:00 am on friday october 24 2014, this all happened from dunnville ontario facing s - se looking towards ny area---from a time frame of 2:00 am - 6:00 am

when i looked up and noticed a very bright star...Watched it closer and realized it is not a star, i seen the white star like object with red and blue blinking lights.....Hovering...I was facing se witnessing this from my perfectly aimed window with a full view of this all... this first object was visible from 2 am - 6am and i fell asleep...It hovered and would go back and forth medium speed, it also went horizontal, vertical and semi circle my first impressions almost like someone was training to fly the vehicle or someone scanning the area?? that was my instincts??

this same craft moved from my left to right (i documented the degrees with my phone)within that time frame

now while this guy was doing his thing.....Also within that time frame i had witnessed 3 shooting star like object about 1/4 up horizon level, first it appeared horizontal from my right it shot left and dissolved...Looked exactly like a shooting star but low and a horizontal flight path instead of vertical....This one really freaked my out!!! i witnessed it hour later same shooting star type but it went from my left to right horizontal..... and about 5 am another shooting star like thing shot low and diagonal it must of hit the ground somewhere..... these were crazy...

now to my third sighting within this 2-6 time frame also while all this was happening i witnessed another object totally different, it seemed to be a orange base colour with a red light (very hard to explain) almost star like but not white.... it hovered kinda like the previous white guy, but orange guy was faster, i really cant remember how long he was there for....But he didnt stay long...

i checked the back of my house and one other white guy only there for awhile, seemed there were 2, one in my se one n

now to the best part!!

after noticing this star first star was not a star...I came inside to document the time....I looked at my microwave clock said 2:09 am..... looked at my stove clock it said 2:09 am........About ten seconds later i double checked my stove clock and it said 2:08 am!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

i am not crazy, i did witness all this, woke my husband up twice to witness what i was seeing, he does confirm the original white dude that he saw 2 with the red and blue lights.

i felt like i was in a movie...I cant believe i wasn't terrified, i was scared but really curious....I have never witnessed ant ufos in my life until the 24th....... 

i have documented writings i did on times and degrees from my compass on my phone, but i am not posting all this right now!!!

i cant be the only one who saw this?????????????????????
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 seperate objects (6 in total) it felt like i was in a sci fi movie from 2-6 am

content.detailedDescription: I saw about 7 starlike objects at 11 am. very static. one of them was orangeish. one of them moved at a very slow velocity. they all dissapeared in about 10 minutes getting smaller until could not be seeing any more.
content.summary: I saw about 7 starlike objects at 11 am. very static. one of them was orangeish. one of them moved at a very slow velocity. they all dissapeared in about 10 minutes getting smaller until could not be seeing any more.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were out walking our dog around our neighborhood. we walk four blocks and it loops us back to our house. it takes about 20 minutes or so. the other night we noticed a hovering aircraft with blinking lights. it was completely stationary in the sky. we were a little alarmed, but with our close proximity to the air force base we just assumed it was and probably is a military craft. what puzzled us was its abrupt take off at a high rate of speed and as to why it was over a residential neighborhood. we have seen similar things and so have our neighbors. we were very troubled by this experience. could it be extra terrestrial, we can't really say. i've seen a lot of aircraft in my time but nothing like that. because of the repeated incidences, i'll start bringing my phone and try to catch some video next time.
content.summary: Hovering blinking lights over my residential then abrupt and incredibly fast take off to somewhere else

content.detailedDescription: I was about 2 miles south of the rickenbacker cause way. me and 3 other people spotted the event. a ball of fire descended at a high rate of speed towards the horizon. the best description i can give is that it looked like a rocket burn. the object went behind a cloud and lit it up, so i know it was really far way and really bright.
content.summary: Ball of fire

content.detailedDescription: On the way home from a short trip the the grocery store a friend that was driving saw a bright light object moving some what rapidly. we were driving south on kipling.  i thought it was an airplane that had caught the reflection of the sun.  just as suddenly as it appeared the light went out.  i expected to see the shape of an airplane but what we saw was a sort of fuzzy round object with no shape with a kind of dark redish color that was dull.  the event lasted just about 5-6 seconds the object vanished.
content.summary: Bright daytime light

content.detailedDescription: When i first observed it, it seemed like a low flying bomber but there was no jet sound. it continued in a straight path to the south then all of a sudden each of the 5 lights went off in a complete different direction. just as that happened a car came down my street and i lost view, after i noticed two airplanes flying from north to south so i would imagine they could see it also.
content.summary: Never seen anything like this. i just can't place any object that could do something like this.

content.detailedDescription:
Szedå‚em z psem ( suczka imieniem luna ) na wieczorny spacer . idä…c miä™dzy blokami osiedla , miaå‚em w zasiä™gu wzroku dåºwig budowlany stojä…cy przy nowo powstajä…cym bloku mieszkalnym . mimo å›wiecä…cych latarni zarejestrowaå‚em "kä…tem oka " jakieå› nowe å›wiatå‚a , poczä…tkowo sä…dziå‚em å¼e to oå›wietlenie ramienia dåºwigu . jednakå¼e po nastä™pnych paru krokach , å›wiatå‚a oddaliå‚y siä™ od dåºwigu i dopiero w tedy spojrzaå‚em w niebo . staå‚em okoå‚o 60 m od dåºwigu kule wirujä…cego ognia ( w szyku trã³jkä…ta ) przesuwaå‚y siä™ na zachã³d bardzo wolno . chwyciå‚em telefon komã³rkowy i zadzwoniå‚em do syna ( 28 lat ) , aby natychmiast wyszedå‚ na balkon i zobaczyå‚ co siä™ dzieje nad dåºwigiem i najlepiej jak by to nagraå‚ . gdy to ujrzaå‚ , pobiegå‚ po mã³j aparat i nagraå‚ filmik . niestety , upå‚ynä™å‚o wiele czasu od chwili gdy kule byå‚y nade mnä… 
( okoå‚o piä™ä‡ minut ) i tylko dziä™ki silnemu powiä™kszeniu kamery widaä‡ na filmie to co ja widziaå‚em goå‚ym okiem . oddaliå‚y siä™ w kierunku zachodnim , aå¼ do zanikniä™cia . nie byå‚em caå‚kiem zaskoczony , widziaå‚em podobne zjawisko 
bä™dä…c nieomal w tym samym miejscu . zdarzyå‚o siä™ to o podobnej porze roku , teå¼ byå‚em na spacerze tym razem z cã³reczkä… wã³wczas okoå‚o piä™cioletniä… . dziaå‚o siä™ to ponad dwadzieå›cia lat temu . widziaå‚em trzy kule å›wiatå‚a ( bo nie byå‚ to ogieå„ ) lecä…ce w nieprawdopodobnym szyku . kule miaå‚y kolor å¼ã³å‚to pomaraå„czowy . miaå‚em wraå¼enie å¼e sä… z moheru , zdawaå‚y siä™ byä‡ miä™kkie i ciepå‚e . åšrodkowa podä…å¼aå‚a po linii prostej ( z pã³å‚nocy na poå‚udnie ) dwie pozostaå‚e kreå›liå‚y "ã³semki" krzyå¼ujä…c siä™ dokå‚adnie na å›rodkowej ... niesamowite !!! to wå‚aå›nie byå‚o szokujä…ce i nieprawdopodobne spotkanie . niestety w tamtych czasach nie miaå‚em sposobnoå›ci tego nagraä‡ .
content.summary: Jak widaä‡ na filmie - trzy kule ognia oddalajä…ce siä™ ze wschodu na zachã³d

content.detailedDescription: At 12:30 am we observed a circular object hovering toward our direction in the sky, over a 30 second timespan we witnessed it almost pulsate colors, orange, red hues before it sunk and gradually disappeared completely. it looked very odd, bulbous in shape and unlike any aircraft we've ever seen. i noticed it first because of the odd hues it gave off, a glow, rather than the typical blinking of airplanes and helicoptors.
content.summary: Glowing orange ufo. observed then vanished! 2 witnesses

content.detailedDescription: I was at my childhood school with my friends during our reunion and i was capturing there photograph. looking through the view finder of my camera i saw this energy ball and then i suddenly captured it. i first thought it's a moon, but then i saw there was no moon there, then i again captured at the same position but i couldn't find any thing. it appeared and then disappeared after my flash of camera harkened after the photo i took. i took multiple shots instantly but couldn't find it again.
content.summary: I saw it with view finder and i clicked and it disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my fiance to work roughly around 4:40 am, we were driving on the 5 north freeway towards los angeles. the radio was not on and we were wide awake conversating. then we noticed something in the sky! i love airplanes so of course i wanted to see it fly over me. well it was clearly not an airplane. it was flying very low as when an airplane is getting near its landing destination. one would think that this plane would crash into a building of how low it was flying. it did not make a single sound nor do i remember any lights on the flying object. my fiance did claim that it had a red light, which sadly is not in my memory. the object had a low glow to it, it was almost transparent to the night sky if it weren't for the low glow it had. it was big the size and shape of an airplane but it did not have wings. it did have something smaller attach to its left side though. i spend every night since october 17,2014 looking through the web for any recorded sightings. i know that at least 30 other individuals had had to seen this! it was flying right on top of us, going in the opposite direction. yet i have not yet to find anything. being a girl that spends hours a week looking at airplanes i can clearly and confidently state that this was not an airplane or any regular flying earth object. i did not believe in ufos until that experience and i will never forget the clear image of that day.
content.summary: Strange object flying extremely close to us

content.detailedDescription: First and foremost, i am a former mufon member that has become freelance.  my manager and i were on the way to a client's house tonight en route to hammond, ny.  as we were headed on 37 north, about 5 minutes from hammond, i had noticed in the sky 2 orange orbs.  there were two that were together; and looked almost like a plane coming in for a landing.  however as i have continued to observe, i had noticed that the "pair" of orbs blinked out and reappeared slightly further north of the position i first saw them.  i had grabbed my manager's attention.  eventually a third one appeared.  i was struggling to get the video on my iphone to work, but i think it was too dark for it  -_-  eventually they stopped "chasing" one another.
content.summary: 3 orbs over field on the way to hammond

content.detailedDescription: My son saw the first set of lughts from our back door.  he went out to investigate.  he called me outside; very excited.  i went out and observed the 4 lights.  i used my phone to record them. i came inside to tell my mom.  my son calls me back out as a lone orb from a different direction has appeared.  i also recorded this on my phone.
content.summary: 4 red orbs. then 1 from different direction.

content.detailedDescription:
My hmmm, recently passed away from cancer at a very young age. this is unfortunate because i never asked for too many details from her regarding a sighting she had if a radar in a crop field  and then a confrontation followed with mib agents that and i quote "came out of nowhere. all i remember is that she had come to some sort of dead end in a corn field while lost on her way back from work going home. i can't ask her the exact location anymore because she is obviously deceased. i guess i should also mention that she only came forward with this story while we were talking about ufos together and she seemed genuinely frightened. it took her around twenty years to tell anyone this story at all. she got very tense whenever i would bring it up to talk about it. again, my proof to you that this was a very intimidating and scary experience for her. back to the story: she was on her way home when she came across a dead end near a crop type of field. before turning around the vehicle she noticed a pulsating light and rotating radar type of machine that had the grass perfectly cut out from underneath it. some sort of machine, from what she observed at that time. she said to herself something along the lines of "what on earth is that". she then looked up and saw a black suv, that "came out of absolutely nowhere". they warned her that she should jot be in this area and that she needed to leave. she tried explaining that she was only lost and they cut her off and gave her very quick and concise directions to get away from the vicinity. these men in black as she described them were very pale, we're wearing sunglasses, and had black suits on. again this is all going off of the memory i have of my mom telling me the story. they had no identification whatsoever which really baffles me. if they were government why didn't they identify what agency they were from? all these questions are still weighing very heavily on me. i wish i could have asked her more about this story but she just seemed so frightened whenever i would bring it up so i learned to avoid it, she was also afraid no one would believe her. please, if you guys can investigate this further for me. any sightings similar to this please forward to me immediately. thank you for your time reading my report. do not hesitate to contact me at 630-699-4842, if you have any further follow up questions regarding my story. 

victor de la cruz
lombard il. 60148
19 years old
content.summary: Mom sighted mib agents in houston texas

content.detailedDescription: I was driving northbound on route 57 and saw three large triangle formation orbs pulled off into a nearby parking lot and then witnessed two other three triangle formation orbs appear. they were traveling north to the east at a moderate pace. all the while having dim red glowing lights that seems to be blinking on and off. i tried to take a video and pictures with my phone but they did not come out too good or clear
content.summary: Three separate triangle formation glowing orbs

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were walking along in a field and noticed a rectangular shaped object to the se of us at approximately 350 yds from us. it hovered for about 2 minutes before descending below the treeline.  it made no sound and we walked to the area near it and noticed a herd of cattle that appeared spooked by it. approximate latitude 35 degrees 55' 22.60 longitude 85 degrees 10' 52.65 at about 100 ft from the ground before descending below the treeline. weather was clear with no clouds high 60s and no other objects in the sky.
content.summary: Observed rectangular shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: As my son and i exited the gym of the highschool, my son witnessed a triangle of lights. he called me over to see it,as we stared the lights went out in sequence. the lights were no longer visable,but the shadow of the triangle vessel could be seen. eventually there was no sign of it.  my son is 13 and he noticed it first.
content.summary: My son & i were walking out of the gym on school campus  he noticed a triangle of lights & called me to observe it as we looked at it. you could see the dark shadow of a triangle vessel.  as we stared, lights turned off and it was no longer visble.

content.detailedDescription: On saturday 10/18 around 6:00pm pst, we were driving south on 405 freeway near howard hughes center.  the evening sun was starting to sit and in from the skies we saw a strange blue light from a distance and slow zooming closer and moving north bound.  my son was able to snap a photo of the object from a decent slr camera.  after viewing the picture and zooming in closer, it appeared as nothing we've never seen before.  flying billboard, small plane, drone??? - no.  can someone make sense of this?
content.summary: Noticed strange blue-ish object flying 500ft+ hover and moving along path

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down route 84 when i saw two objects hovering in sequence. they then darted faster than anything i've ever witnessed outbofnsight in a straight line.
content.summary: Hovered in sequence then direction change into straight path out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was walking along the beach in alameda.

2.  the bright glare

3.  reflection of some sort

4.  glowing object seemed to hover in a stationary position for approximately 30 minutes and then completely disappeared before the naked eye.

5.  awe-struck

6.  after watching the object as i was walking along the 1 1/2 mile stretch of the beach, i turned toward washington park and took a last look and noticed that it was gone.
content.summary: Hundreds of people including myself noticed a hovering ball of light over the san francisco bay

content.detailedDescription:
Being a pilot on the 747-8 freighter, i flew a regular flight between hongkong and anchorage on august 24th.
after about 5 hours in flight we left japan behind us and were cruising at a comfortable 34.000ft with about 4,5 hours to go towards alaska. 
we heard via the radio and other aircraft about earthquakes in iceland, chile and san francisco, and since there were a few volcanos on our route that might or might not be going off during our flight, we double checked with dispatch if there was any new activity on our route after we departed from hongkong. 
then, very far in the distance ahead of us, just over the horizon an intense light flash shot up from the ground. it looked like a lightning bolt, but way more intense and directed vertically up in the air. i have never seen anything like this, and there were no flashes before or after this single explosion of light. 
since there were no thunderstorms on our route or weather-radar, we kept a close lookout for possible storms that might be hiding from our radar and might cause some problems later on. 

i decided to try and take some pictures of the night sky and the strange green glow that was all over the northern hemisphere. i think it was sort of a northern lights but it was much more dispersed, never seen anything like this before either. probably a typical green 'earth glow', that is related to the northern lights due to the electromagnetic field around the earth being influenced by the solar storm of the last week.
about 20 minutes later in flight i noticed a deep red/orange glow appearing ahead of us, and this was a bit strange since there was supposed to be nothing but endless ocean below us for hundreds of miles around us. a distant city or group of typical asian squid-fishing-boats would not make sense in this area, apart from the fact that the lights we saw were much larger in size and glowed red/orange, instead of the normal yellow and white that cities or ships would produce. 
the closer we got, the more intense the glow became, illuminating the clouds and sky below us in a scary orange glow. in a part of the world where there was supposed to be nothing but water. 

since the nearest possible airport was at least 2 hours flying away, and the idea of flying into a highly dangerous and invisible ash-plume in the middle of the night over the vast pacific ocean we felt not exactly happy. fortunately we did not encounter anything like an ash cloud, but together with the very creepy unexplainable deep red/orange glow from the ocean's surface, we felt everything but comfortable. there was also no other traffic near our position or on the same routing to confirm anything of what we saw or confirm any type of ash clouds encountered. 

we reported our observations to air traffic control but we were the only ones who saw the lights that night.
- three independent lightning-observing agencies have confirmed that there were no electrical dischargers that night 3 hours before and after the observed lightning flash, and not in a radius of at least 500km/250nm of the observed flash. thus very unlikely that it was a lightning strike.

- no seismic activity in that part of the ocean measured, this area is not seismically active since the last 10.000 years so a volcano is unlikely.

- possible russian naval rocket test or salvage operation since its close to petropavlovsk, home of the russian pacific submarine fleet.
- days later the russians have closed the airspace north of this location because with the official announcement of rocket/weapon tests.

- red lights are normally not used for fishing, so a fishing fleet is not likely. white/green lights are used for fishing, and from smaller sources since ships are not that large.

- individual lights were about 100-300 meters (300-1000ft) in diameter, the total cluster/group of lights about 30km / 20 miles in diameter.
- lights did not appear to move, flicker or change intensity. 
- no abnormalities in navigation equipment, on board systems, radios or gps-data.
- lights were extremely bright, so bright that they even illuminated the clouds around us and were visible for a good 300km distance.

- we were the only two persons on board, since we flew a cargo plane. no other aircraft in the vicinity, nearest aircraft was about 1800km further away.
- airport of petropavlovsk (enroute alternate) was closed due to maintenance.

- added is a photo for comparison; we overflew the city of winnipeg a few days later. the city of winnipeg is about 25km wide from any angle, it shows the relative size of the patch of lights we saw. 

- camera used; nikon d800. lens; nikkor 10.5mm fisheye f/2.8. all manual settings are visible on the photos.
content.summary: Strange orange/red lights over pacific ocean during night flight

content.detailedDescription: 7:00 p.M. looked in direction of the strange objects i saw on 10/11/2014. saw a light that appeared to be hovering, pulsing, and possibly changing colors. i have not been able to edit this video, or view it, because after i uploaded the video from 10/11/2014, my computer stopped working.
content.summary: Pulsing light hovers, then descends.

content.detailedDescription: Watching solar eclipse 10-23-14. took pics. this thing was first captured above the sun as a dot. as it descended it turned red orange and sunk into the horizon. very weird for me, looking for explanations. feeling like i need answers. sight was lost when it sunk into horizon. what is it?
content.summary: Round red with spots

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home one day from the gym when i noticed a mirrored-like sphere floating above my neighborhood about 30 feet above the rooves to my left. as i drove past it it seemed to follow my path parallel and at one point i drove underneath it. at its closest altitude it was approximately 50 feet above me. it made no sound, left no emissions, and had no identifiable characteristics. it appeared to have a mirrored finish but didnt reflect surrounding objects. after passing over me it continued up to the hills until disappearing behind them. i observed this object for approximately 5 minutes.
content.summary: Noticed a mirrored sphere hovering above my neighborhood as i drove by. it followed parallel to me then went over the hills.

content.detailedDescription: I have been watching this thing for 30 min to an hour. it stays in it's location but moves around in a zig zag or dancing pattern side to side and up and down with actually going anywhere. it hovers in same spot for long periods. when a plane was approaching at about the same altitude, it moved up about double and then triple the space above the plane. after the plane passed, it came back down. it is now (1:40 am) hovering just above the ridge. i am between grafton and morgantown on rt 119. the ufo is in the eastern sky. when i first started watching it was just to the right of the dipper. it is lower in the sky now and the dipper is up above.  i tried taking photos with camera phone and a video camera which ran out of power and then film...Don't know if i got anything.
content.summary: Larger than plane, ufo hovering and zig-zagging w/o leaving
